im/in/mit/am/an/on/from!

𓅓 Mit/with => mvt 木目 mud/wood/Video/wu 乌 vs craven 烏 crown

ϫⲓⲛ -ing 𓅓
m- contiunous prefix: im Tanze = dance-ing (beim Tanzen)
m- noun prefix ⋍ -moi -um -on -en -ion -ing: das Tanzen, the dance-ing
miḵtaḇ מכתב maktab مكتب "letter" (Hebrew), "office" (Arabic)

Ambivalence list:

𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓋴 𓀙 𓅯 𓏛 𓏥 | mosquito | κώνωψ kṓnōps “mosquito” κουνούπι kounoúpi +++

𓅓 𓂝 𓆓 𓂧 𓐦 𓂡 | press hard on, hit, strike (the mouth in funerary ritual) | 1. MACE/march 2.press
𓅓 𓂝 𓆓 𓂧 𓐦 𓂡 | practice (a virtue), press on (with) | master 𓅓𓂝𓆓𓂧! 2. practice⋍𓅓𓂝𓆓𓂧 𓅓𓂝=pro
𓅓 𓂝 𓆭 | make fast, bind | 1. mend 2. bind

𓌰 𓅓 𓂝 𓁀| go to sleep| dormir ܕܡܟ dəmeḵ ⇔ 𓅓 Dommel

Ambivalence explained:
1. buma (the owl)
2. mabu (Semitic reanalysis)
3. bumaᵏ (Turk/PIE reanalysis)
4. b⋍m phonetically

Verbal suffix make (Turkish -mek -mak Greek -ma -moi)
𓈖 𓈟 𓅓 𓀜 | save, rescue | نَجَاة najāh™ Bengali: নাজাত najat Persian: نجات دادن nejât dâdan Turkish: necatmak أَنْقَذَ ʾanqaḏa ن ق ذ n-q-ḏ

Noun gerund suffix -ing: dancing as prefix 𓅓 𒉆 nam... ⋍ im Tanze

𓅓 𓂋 overseer "mayor" 𒅆𒁾 𒈤
